author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: The FireBeetle 2 ESP32-P4 is an upcoming compact development board designed for real-time image processing, video streaming, and wireless communication. It targets HMI applications such as digital photo frames, security systems, home control panels, and smart doorbells. The board is built around the ESP32-P4R32 microcontroller, which features a dual-core 400 MHz RISC-V processor for high-performance […]
title: (Updated) DFRobot Previews RISC-V-Based FireBeetle 2 with ESP32-P4, Targeting Image and Video Applications

author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: Tria, an Avnet company focused on embedded compute platforms, has introduced a new lineup of Qualcomm-powered SoMs. Based on Snapdragon and QCS series processors, the modules support scalable designs using standards like OSM, SMARC, COM-HPC, and COM Express for applications in automation, edge AI, medical systems, and more. The MSC OSM-LF-IQ615 module adopts the OSM […]
title: Tria Expands Embedded Portfolio with Qualcomm SoMs Supporting Windows, Android, and Linux

author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: GigaDevice has launched the GD32C231 series, a new line of 32-bit microcontrollers based on the Arm Cortex-M23 core. Designed for entry-level embedded applications, the series balances performance, power efficiency, and cost, particularly for compact or battery-powered products. The GD32C231 targets use cases such as home appliances, battery management systems, small-screen displays, handheld consumer devices, industrial […]
title: Cortex-M23 Powers GigaDevice’s GD32C231 Series for Entry-Level Embedded Systems

author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: The Nucleo N657X0-Q is a development board from STMicroelectronics built around the STM32N657 microcontroller. Part of the Nucleo-144 family, it offers a compact form factor and a variety of expansion options for prototyping and evaluation across different power and performance needs. This board features the STM32N657X0 microcontroller, based on the Arm Cortex-M55 core operating at […]
title: ST Nucleo Board Implements STM32N6 Series with Neural-ART Acceleration Support

author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: The MBM-T113 is a 60x60mm Mobile-ITX embedded board from FusionTech, built around the Allwinner T113-S3 processor. It incorporates a dual-core ARM Cortex-A7 and a HiFi4 DSP, and is intended for use in compact embedded systems where multimedia capabilities and space efficiency are required. FusionTech notes that the Cortex-A7 cores operate at 1.2GHz. The board is […]
title: FusionTech MBM-T113 Delivers Compact ARM-Based Performance in Mobile-ITX Form Factor
